entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.4.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Image fit

Replaced fill_screen with image_fit as fill_screen was a bit too ambiguous. Continuing to use fill_screen will not break Kiosk but will not do anything.

More documentation about image_fit here

WebP

Kiosk now supports WebP previews from Immich. So if you want to use WebP as the preview format, you can!

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.4.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

This patch adds a fix for when a client has a different version to the Kiosk server.

Example: * You're running Immich Kiosk v0.4.1 and have an iFrame running in Home Assistant. * You update Immich Kiosk to v0.4.2 via Docker. * Unless you have refreshed the Home Assistant page the iFrame will still be running v0.4.1. * On the client's next image request, the Immich Kiosk server will instruct the client to refresh, prompting an update on the client.

‚ö° Fixes

  • version mismatch fix by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/27

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.4.0...v0.4.1

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.5.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

[!NOTE] I am still on paternity leave with my little one but I found a little time to finish these features off! If you find any bugs, feel free to raise an issue üôÇ

Password

You can now secure access to Kiosk using a password.

Q: How do I set a password?\ A: üëá * via config.yaml file

yaml kiosk: password: 12345

  • via ENV in your docker-compose file yaml environment: KIOSK_PASSWORD: "12345"

Then to access Kiosk you MUST add the password param in your URL e.g. http://{URL}?password=12345

Caching

Kiosk now uses caching for some of it's API calls. At the moment it will cache calls for people and album assets. The cache is stored/used for 5 minutes. This is on by default but you can disable it via the config.yaml file or via ENV.

config.yaml yaml kiosk: cache: false

ENV yaml environment: KIOSK_CACHE: FALSE

Multiple albums

You can now add multiple albums just like you can add multiple people.

Q: How do I set multiple albums?\ A: üëá * via config.yaml file

yaml album: - ALBUM_ID - ALBUM_ID

  • via ENV in your docker-compose file use a , to separate IDs yaml environment: KIOSK_ALBUM: "ALBUM_ID,ALBUM_ID,ALBUM_ID"

  • via url quires http://{URL}?album=ALBUM_ID&album=ALBUM_ID&album=ALBUM_ID

üöÄ New Features

  • Adding authentication to front end (password) by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/33
  • Person and Album Api endpoint caching by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/34
  • Use multiple albums by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/35

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.4.1...v0.5.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

User friendly time layouts

Implement the (IMO) more user friendly date layout "YYYY-MM-DD"

You can use the below values to create your preferred date layout.

| Value | Example output | |-------------|--------------| | YYYY | 2024 | | YY | 24 | | MMMM | August | | MMM | Aug | | MM | 08 | | M | 8 | | DDDD | Monday | | DDD | Mon | | DD | 04 | | D | 4 |

Date layout examples

These examples assume that today's date is the 22nd of August 2024.

  • "YYYY-MM-DD" => "2024-08-22"
  • "YYYY/MM/DD" => "2024/08/22"
  • "YYYY:MM:DD" => "2024:08:22"
  • "YYYY MM DD" => "2024 08 22"
  • "YY M DDD" => "24 8 Thur"
  • "YY MMM DDDD" => "24 Aug Thursday"
  • "YYYY MMMM DDDD DD" => "2024 August Thursday 22"

Releasing GO binaries

Added GO binaries to releases for those want to bypass Docker.

What's Changed

üöÄ New Features

  • Easier date layout for users by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/36

Other changes

  • Add Goreleaser to create GO binaries by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/37

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.5.0...v0.6.0

entry.title: New release for Immich Kiosk: v0.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

Pausing Kiosk

Clicking/tapping on Kiosk will pause the refresh timer. Clicking/tapping again will reset and restart the timer.

Added devices history

Each devices now stores past images (currently limited to 10 entries). This is setting the base for future endeavours üëÄ.

Added disable_screensaver option

Setting disable_screensaver to true will ask the browser to request that the device does not dim the screen, activate screensaver or lock the device.

Added hide_cursor option

Setting hide_cursor to true will hide the cursor/mouse.

Colourful debug logging

Debug mode now colours each request ID differently (generated from the request ID string) for easier log scanning. Added prettier Config logging output.

Stopped archived images from displaying

üöÄ New Features

  • Clicking/tapping on Kiosk will pause the refresh timer. Clicking/tapping again will reset and restart the timer.
  • Added in page history by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/50
  • Added Disable screensaver config option by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/51
  • Add hide_cursor option by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/53

‚ö° Fixes

  • Improved per request logging and excluding archived images by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/41
  • Fix bug where archived images would show by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/47

üìì Documentation

  • Removed obsolete raw query support by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/52

üî® Maintenance

  • Utilising Echo bind by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/48
  • Reworked how Kiosk manages cache memory to have a smaller footprint
  • Reworked how config defaults are initiated. They are now set via struct tags vs vipers Bind

Other changes

  • Remove route init function in favour of passing config instance by @damongolding in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/42
  • Update README.md by @brayStorm in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/39

New Contributors

  • @brayStorm made their first contribution in https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/pull/39

Full Changelog: https://github.com/damongolding/immich-kiosk/compare/v0.6.0...v0.7.0
